mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room(roomCode, roomName, floorNum, price, rcontent, saveFileName) VALUES(SEQ_ROOM.NEXTVAL, #{roomName}, #{floorNum}, #{price}, #{rcontent}, #{saveFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT r.roomCode, r.roomName, r.floorNum, price, r.content, saveFileName, f.floorName, f.spotCode, s.spotName, s.region,s.spotaddrnum, s.spotaddr1, s.manager, s.tel FROM ROOM r JOIN floor f ON r.floorNum = f.floorNum JOIN spot s ON f.spotCode=s.spotCode WHERE roomCode=#{roomCode}
